name: Disable-CameraAccess
commandPattern: param([string]$Scope = 'CurrentUser'); $path = if ($Scope -eq 'AllUsers') { 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\webcam' } else { 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\webcam' }; New-Item -Path $path -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Deny'
